article_title: Majority of Americans don't want Obamacare repealed now
article_text:
Total Access

Enjoy the convenience of home delivery plus Digital D. Sign up for our BEST VALUE today!

article_metadata.description: It might come as news to Republican presidential candidate Ted Cruz, but a majority of Americans are not, in his words, dreaming of “repealing every word of Obamacare.” Fifty-one percent of U.S. adults say that while the Affordable Care Act might require changes, “we should see how it works,” according to a new Bloomberg Politics poll.
